title: Golfer
summaries: The Golfer is an NPC vendor that sells golfing-related items. More items will unlock as the player plays more golf, including clubs, trophies, and paintings. He will initially spawn in the Underground Desert, being stationary, and talking to him in this state will "free" him. If the stationary Golfer is killed, he will still be able to respawn afterwards; if the Golfer NPC is killed, he will move in again after some time as long as there are vacant houses.
The Golfer will attack nearby enemies with his golf balls to defend himself.
He is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
